aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.text: Since I was a kid I've always loved math, logic and everything related to this world. I studied Civil Engineering in college and not long after, I chose Software Engineering, that's where I found the exact profession for me!

first.title: Web Development
first.text: Build websites and web apps using javascript, typescript and their frameworks. I use technologies like HTML, CSS, Javascript, typescript, and tools like: VSCode ,React JS ,Next JS, Redux, Mongodb, Git, Github, Vite, and more.

second.title: Web and user interface
second.text: I have experience building UI, Websites, Apps, Photos, Logos with tools like Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma, Pen & Paper.

third.title: Software Engineering
third.text: All processes to build a system. Databases, security, hosting, development, management, etc...

first.title: Civil Engineering - FMU Fisp, Brazil, 2012
first.text: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering from the FMU Fisp, in São Paulo, one of the biggest colleges in Latin America.

second.title: Software Engineering - Le Wagon, Portugal, 2019
second.text: In-depth 4-month-long full-stack coding bootcamp in Lisbon with technologies like Python, Javascript and React, for example.
